story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0101_0100_1:
Come on, you guys know the rules, don’tcha?
If two Trainers’ eyes meet, they hafta battle!
story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
We fight who we want!
If you get in our way, we’ll fight you, too!
story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0501_0100_1: Psssh! It was just a bad matchup!
story_zako_battle_01_01/3701_0501_0200_1:
It’s gonna take a lot more than that to
keep us from battling the Champion!
story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0101_0100_1:
Now scram! We came here to fight Cynthia,
and we’re not leavin’ till we do it!
What are you gettin’ in our way for?!
story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
These blockheads won’t even be a good
warm-up, but if they want a whoopin’,
a whoopin’ they’ll get!
story_zako_battle_01_01/3801_0501_0100_1: Graahhh! We missed our opportunity thanks to you!
